div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1336 Marmara (anc. Proconnesus), Mysia, (655) 1863 Burial: c. 110-100 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 70 AR. Pot hoard Lysimachus: 11 post? tetradr. Athens: 1 tetradr. Nicomedes II-III: 8 tetradr. (latest 117/6 B.C.) Cyzicus: 5 tetradr. (as BMC 146) Pergamum: 1 cist. Disposition: dispersed Waddington, RN 1865, pp. 25-8, illus.
